# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $150 to me. I believe it could be a valuable asset for you as well. Considering its quality and potential benefits, I am offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to own a high-quality item at a reasonable premium. I look forward to hearing your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
